description: Returns an element or array of elements based on selector type.

parameters.name: selector
parameters.description: CSS syntax for an element selector. Can be stringed and use attribute selectors.

name: on
description: Attaches function to various types of events.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: JavaScript event name.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Function or function reference to be called on trigger of event.

example: $$("#container").on("click", handleClick);$$("#container").on("swipeleft", function (e) {	alert("Swiped left on: " + e.target.id);});

parameters.name: property
parameters.description: CSS property name.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Valid value for the property given.

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: Length of the delay in milliseconds. Default: 0.

name: animate
description: Uses CSS transition to apply a simple animation to an element

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Object of CSS properties as keys and corresponding valid CSS values as their values.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Length of the duration of the animation in milliseconds. Default: 500.

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: Length of the delay of the animation in milliseconds. Default: 0.

parameters.name: ease
parameters.description: CSS name of easing function. Default is "ease."

name: $$.addCSS
description: Adds a new CSS rule to the page

parameters.name: element
parameters.description: CSS selector for the element that the new CSS rule should apply to.

parameters.name: property
parameters.description: CSS property name.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Valid value for the property given.

example: $$.addCSS(#container::after, "content", "This goes at the end of the container element")

name: $$.ajax
description: Creates an AJAX call to an external file.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description:
"url"*: Path to the file being requested.

"type": Response type expected. Options: "ajax", "json". Default: "ajax".

"method": HTTP method for requesting the data. Options: any HTTP request method. Default: "GET".

"async": Boolean of whether the call should be made asynchrously. Default: true.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Function to execute after request is complete. Passes the returned data through the first (and only) parameter.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Used when sending file data using the Files API

name: $$.contains
description: Returns boolean of whether a substring is contained within a larger string

parameters.name: haystack
parameters.description: The string to be searched.

parameters.name: needle
parameters.description: The substring being searched for

name: $$.getParam
description: Returns the value of a URL query parameter

parameters.name: urlQueryParameter
parameters.description: The key of the URL query parameter.

name: $$.isMobile
description: Returns boolean of whether the device being used is a mobile or tablet device

parameters.name: none
parameters.description: N/A

parameters.name: assets
parameters.description: Path to asset asset or array of paths to assets to be preloaded.

name: $$.rand
description: Returns a random integer between two given integers.

parameters.name: min
parameters.description: Minimum integer that can be returned.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum integer that can be returned.
